book.synopsis: Uses excerpts from the letters, diaries, and memoirs of the combatants to recreate the Tennessee battle, and assesses its influence on the outcome of the Civil War
book.title_long: No Better Place to Die: The Battle of Stones River (Civil War Trilogy)
book.dimensions: Height: 0.93 Inches, Length: 8.96 Inches, Weight: 1.03 Pounds, Width: 6 Inches
